events.name: HARMONY 2012
events.about:
The HARMONY 2012 meeting will be hosted by the Department of Bioinformatics at Maastricht University. You can find more information about the meeting on our website.

We are welcoming you in Maastricht from May 21 until May 25, 2012. 

Registration:

  • If you want to attend the complete 5 day meeting please make sure to register for the 5-day Hackathon.  
  • On the first meeting day (Monday May 21, 2012) we are organizing an open symposium with tutorials in the morning, talks in the afternoon and a poster session / reception in the evening. If you are interested in Systems Biology, the different format standards and the COMBINE community, but are not yet actively involved, please register for the 1-day symposium.

We set the maximum number of participants to 70 for the 5-day hackathon and to additional 40 for the first day. In case that there are no registrations left, but you would like to come to HARMONY 2012, please feel free to contact us (harmony2012@maastrichtuniversity.nl).


Registration Deadline: May 1, 2012
